description: Contains field technician observations and maintenance records from the mWater mobile data collection platform. These notes provide crucial context for interpreting sensor measurements and identifying periods of sensor maintenance or malfunction.
purpose: Store field observations, maintenance records, and contextual information that informs quality control decisions

data_source.description: Mobile data collection platform for field technicians
data_source.api_access: REST API with embedded authentication URL
data_source.backup_strategy: cached files with timestamps for offline access

field_note_types.description: General observations about sensor operations, maintenance activities, and site conditions
Specific records of sensor malfunctions requiring data flagging
Records of sensor maintenance and cleaning activities

qaqc_flags: Field visit flags - exact timestamps of technician activities
Site visit windows - buffer periods around maintenance
Malfunction flags - known sensor issues affecting data quality
Sonde movement flags - equipment repositioning events
processing_functions: add_field_notes() - integrates notes with sensor data

file_formats: json - primary format from mWater API
cached files with timestamps for backup access

data_structure.timezone_handling: converted to UTC for consistency with sensor data

access_patterns.write_frequency: real-time during field operations plus daily backup

quality_impact.critical_for_qaqc: Field notes essential for accurate quality control
quality_impact.flag_generation: Source of manual flags that override automated assessments

error_handling.api_failure: fallback to most recent cached field notes
error_handling.data_validation: timestamp and site name consistency checks
